SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: PROVIDED SCHOLARSHIPS FOR HUNGARIAN STUDENTS TO COME TO THE UNITED STATES TO STUDY/RESEARCH WITH PROFESSORS. THE STUDENTS ARE ATTENDING VARIOUS HIGHER INSTITUTIONS OF EDUCATION THROUGHOUT THE ENTIRE UNITED STATES. THEY INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO THE UNIVERISTY OF AZ, RUTGERS UNIVERSITY, MONTEREY INSTITUTE OF INT'L STUDIES, UNIVERSITY OF NE, DARTMOUTH COLLEGE, WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY AT ST. LOUIS, SCRIPPS RESEARCH INSTITUTE, HARVARD MEDICAL SCHOOL, HULT INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL OF BUSINESS, UCLA, JOHNS HOPKINS BLOOMBERG SCHOOL, UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN, UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS, UNIVERSITY OF CA AT BERKLEY, NY SCHOOL OF INTERIOR DESIGN, UNIVERSITY OF MIAMI AND VARIOUS OTHERS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: PROVIDED SCHOLARSHIPS FOR UNDERPRIVILEGED HIGH SCHOOL GRADUATE STUDENTS TO COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES. THE STUDENTS ARE ATTENDING VARIOUS HIGHER INSTITUTIONS OF EDUCATION THROUGHOUT THE ENTIRE UNITED STATES.
